title: Srsly...
body:
So, ok. Maybe I'm not the mooost sportsman player in the world but... seriously...? I got 10 chat restriction games for this?
Kąýń: gj

Kąýń: maybe
Kąýń: play
Kąýń: def
Kąýń: zyra?
Kąýń: says the one that enver stays behind minions while against a blitz
Kąýń: and myabe

Kąýń: WHAT THE FUCK. IS THAT HITBOX
Kąýń: no
Kąýń: nope
Kąýń: his q
Kąýń: hit here
Kąýń: and somehow got me

Kąýń: and now she takes my farm too
Kąýń: good fiucking, supp.
Kąýń: well im better than u
Kąýń: so

Kąýń: nice dragons ww
Kąýń: oh yeah
Kąýń: nvm
Kąýń: dont talk to me unless u get objectives

Kąýń: i my defense. ur champ requires autism levels to play

Kąýń: and didn't give sivir

Kąýń: hey ww nice dragons
Kąýń: report ww flame ty :*

Kąýń: its sad cuz ww cant even english

Kąýń: i said ur champion is autistic
Kąýń: sorry u cant make the difference p
Kąýń: dude stop flaming
Kąýń: and start playing

Kąýń: yep. and u didnt take it
Kąýń: reported :*
Kąýń: flame
Kąýń: and nice drake ww
Kąýń: ikr
Kąýń: pls report ww for flaming.
Kąýń: if he was at least good then yeah, he could flame
Kąýń: ww doesnt need
Kąýń: help
Kąýń: he's a lifesteal simulator

Kąýń: jarvan join our team pls
Kąýń: dude he's flaming
Kąýń: dont take his defense just because i killed u top
Kąýń: i love blitz's hook
Kąýń: has 2000 range
Kąýń: ww going 1v3..
Kąýń: 4/6
Kąýń: 6/5
Kąýń: im actually better
Kąýń: sure.
Kąýń: jarvan ww is unreasonable
Kąýń: dont u see how tilted he is
Kąýń: U FLAME EVERYONE LMFAO
Kąýń: uhuh.
Kąýń: sure.
Kąýń: man ur so desperated to get rid of reports
Kąýń: lol instakilled
Kąýń: gg. dont forget to report ww for flame and troll :)
Kąýń: ww u realize we lost because of u right?
Kąýń: the only time i flamed is at zyra because i told her she gave sivir 2 free kills
Kąýń: at least i stopped unlike u, kiddy
Kąýń: well ur trash too but i dont say it
Kąýń: its consideered flaming ;p
Kąýń: ww learn some english please
Kąýń: i cant understand you
Kąýń: aand 4/8.
Kąýń: gg report ww


Basically what happened here is that zyra was taking my farm, she gave sivir 2 free kills, fiora lost mid against karma and Warwick didn't gank, didn't do objectives, went 1v3 trying to solo Jarvan, and somehow I'm still the bad guy. Did I really flame that much in this game? The only times I actually flamed (Fiora and Zyra) is because they also flamed me. Yeah ik, shitty excuse. But seriously now... I reported ww. He called me a retard, kept arguing with Jarvan and he got nothing. No penalty. But I did? Fucking seriously?

replies.body: yeah i'm surprised too you only got a 10 game chat restriction
Lucky you didnt get perma for telling someone to kill themselves. If youre going to keep that up make a new account so you have one ready for when that time comes.
Really? I've reported so many ppl that swore and talked about real life harm and I got no "Instant feedback report".
I notice if they say exactly "kys" 3 times or more 75% of the time i get the popup. On the other hand ive had them type the entire words multiple times with no popup.

Wow... you only have to say "Kys" to get perma'd... nice. Good to know that if I start trolling, I won't get punished. But if I swear, I do. This is League of Legends, not some kiddy playground. Why don't they focus on the more troll side of LoL instead of the toxic one? Also... am I really the only one that thinks just because someone says "kys" even jokingly, they get banned is ridiculous?
Text chat is easier to analyze. In business everything comes back to cost.
I still find it a bit off. I have higher chances of not getting banned just if I don't say "kys" or "autism" just.. what the hell.
It works like a spam filter. Words and sentence structures have weights assinged. How else can you analyze speech on a binary computer system besides using math.
Just. GG.
Yep. Definitely deserved worse. Prime example of why I just mute everyone every game. No one gets punished as severely as they deserve for this sort of thing.

Srsly people are waaaaaayy too butthurt. Just because you say "kys" this doesn't mean they will actually do it. And by muting everyone you refuse to comunicate with your team. That used to be a ban worthy reason.
False. The mute option is there specifically so you don't have to put up with garbage in the chat. You can communicate anything you need to using pings alone. The chat is entirely unnecessary.
First thing i do when i see log like this i do CTRL+ F and i type "kys" and voila always there
Wow... glad to know that as long as I don't use "kys" or "autism" I will never get banned.
You will. Eventually.
Saying kys and autism normally is a ban not chat restrict. You're lucky.

So... Let's create a scenario.

Player 1: OMFG FUCKING RETARD. STOP FEEDING U PIECE OF SHIT. I FUCK UR MOM EVERYDAY U %%%% LICKING CUM TRASH.
Player 2: kys u autistic noob.

*Player 2 gets banned* {{item:3070}}
Well, both players are at fault. If they both had other negative messages that game it would be a 14 day suspension for each, if not then it would be a chat restriction.
Player 1 was warwick. Player 2 was me. Warwick literally got nothing. No fucking penalty whatsoever. That's why I even made this post. Ok, I flamed fml. But he also flamed and got shit as a penalty.
[Citations needed]
And how you know he didnt get a punishment? You rarely get the instant feedback massage even if it did punish someone.
I always got an instant feedback message.

> [{quoted}](name=Kąýń,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6bRWsMLr,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-07-06T18:42:02.208+0000)
>
> So... Let's create a scenario.
> 
> Player 1: OMFG FUCKING RETARD. STOP FEEDING U PIECE OF SHIT. I FUCK UR MOM EVERYDAY U %%%% LICKING CUM TRASH.
> Player 2: kys u autistic noob.
> 
> *Player 2 gets banned* {{item:3070}}

The second is a little worse and you can always mute.

For kys only 10 game chat restriction? You are very lucky with it. 

 Last time i heard dude got 2 weeks ban for it.

I'm sure you are completely aware of most of the things that made you get the chat restriction (like literally telling someone to kill themselves), but I wan't to point out that **asking for other players to report someone is not allowed and in some cases will contribute to a punishment for you**. Not many people know this, but Riot has stated numerous times they do not want people asking others to report someone, one report is enough and makes the system check the flagged game.

Never knew about this. Since warwick himself kept spamming people to report me. And I really hate the fact that riot focuses more on the toxic part of the community rather than on the troll side. It's kinda frustrating to see someone inting, trollpicking, etc. And he gets no punishment, but people that just say "kys" get permanenty banned.

Well I'm glad I could help out so you do know what Riot doesn't allow, a lot of these threads end up dead because everyone just yells at the OP and there isn't any back and forth. Riot focuses a lot more on things like hate speech and "kys" threats because they are **a lot easier** to pick up on and never really a grey area. 

On the other hand, with "trollpicking" or "inting", a ton of the instances aren't necessarily trolling or inting. Riot tries their best to defend off meta picks (personally I've played jungle Swain and done fine, not reportable) so when someone picks a character that isn't necessarily the best fit, it's not reportable. It's only reportable in that instance if they INT, which is where I'm getting to next. INTing is running it down lane deliberately to simply feed, racking up scores like 0/22/0 by the end of the game. **The system already automatically detects things like this, and I have seen many instances of people getting banned for this on the spot**. However, doing badly (like 2/14/6) is not INTing because the player is trying. Riot doesn't want to punish a person for being bad at the game, because that would go completely against they're business model as the game makers.

TL;DR Verbal stuff is easy to flag and punish, physical stuff is more of an iffy are sometimes.
I actually got banned once for "intentionally feeding". Everyone reported me because I was doing very poorly and ended up with a 14 days ban. I was probably like... 2/13/6 or something in that area.

If that happens again, send a support ticket with screenshots of the stats of the game explaining how you weren't feeding, they can help you out and ideally reinstate your account because simply doing poorly is *not* intentional feeding.

>  somehow I'm still the bad guy

glad you figured that out.
